positive.review:
Since I first played Civ VI I've bought every game before that (5, 4 and now 3). I'm currently hooked to the game. It is complex (find that the AI is more challenging) and makes me remember of the games I played in my early teenage years in the early 2000.

It is quite amazing that I happen to discover Civ this late at my age.

I super recommend this game.
Absorbing and graphics better than later versions which over complicate
Just a fun strat game. A blast from the past. Cute, quirky, etc. :)

Very good settler spam game
somehow laggy on my laptop LOL
Wonderful way to spend a rainy day. Start out small and build. Set your level for ease or struggle.
my dad got me into this game its hard to grasp some concepts but once you do its pretty fun
Not politically correct, but very nostalgic.
A classic still worth playing all these years later!
Very nostalgic for me. I like the y2k graphics
Chinese empire built pyramid is accurate, 10/10 game
it's a great game to learn about, wel... civilization  :)
classic, conquer the world0
I played for more that 11 hours total and still have no idea how to play properly.
I got to be God for 20 minutes.
My favorite civ of them all!
Been playing this game since it came out soooo good
best version of civ
This is the best game ever created
Cool Autism Game
Classic Game
great
very re-playable
Game still rocks!
Still great game
love it!!
Best Civ.
nuke your enemies
yes
yeah
Simple to play, very addictive, it's a long game, from start to finish usually around 40 hours. Enjoy

Civilization is my favorite PC game by far! It's a great game if you enjoy a slow paced style game with great detail into every aspect of managing you civilization. I recommend ANY of the series to play with #3 being the top of the list.

Classic civ! This installment (while not without its flaws) provides probably the most straight-forward civ gameplay with a LOT of charm. There are a few systems that have been much more refined in more recent installments into the franchise, but I do keep coming back to this absolute classic.

Since I first played Civ VI I've bought every game before that (5, 4 and now 3). I'm currently hooked to the game. It is complex (find that the AI is more challenging) and makes me remember of the games I played in my early teenage years in the early 2000.

It is quite amazing that I happen to discover Civ this late at my age.

I super recommend this game.
Absorbing and graphics better than later versions which over complicate
Fun game. Sometimes I have more fun just discovering the world rather than fighting other civilizations!
Just a fun strat game. A blast from the past. Cute, quirky, etc. :)

Very good settler spam game
somehow laggy on my laptop LOL
Wonderful way to spend a rainy day. Start out small and build. Set your level for ease or struggle.

This game holds up surprisingly well. I remember playing this as a kid and decided to play it again on a whim. Main issue I'm having with this game currently is the old school game thing of my screen resolution getting crushed and the game having a weirdly hard time rendering too many unit animations in a row such that the screen freezes until they all complete sometimes.
A great game, a little outdated visualy but great game mechanics.  also a fraction of the price of the new ones, sometimes free
my dad got me into this game its hard to grasp some concepts but once you do its pretty fun

This version of Civ is often overlooked in favor of newer versions.  It more then has its merits.  Though Civ 4 is still the best, this is still an excellent game and deserves to be played as more then a curiosity.  Worth your time.
Not politically correct, but very nostalgic.
i used to play this on my old comp before it shit the bed now playing it on steam hard to get into but it is the best civ
Never gets old. CIVIII player for 20 years, give or take...
Amazing game play and not to complicated
A classic still worth playing all these years later!
Civ III is 1 better than Civ II and 3 worse than Civ VI. That is a review based strictly on numerical progression. It's good though.
This game is still rad. The feudal Japanese scenario is worth it on its own.
Very nostalgic for me. I like the y2k graphics
This game was the peak of my 30yr gaming history. Also the peak of the civ series.

Its a great and simple civilisation game, 6 is too complex, 7 is a disaster. Never got into 4 and 5.

But 3 needs improved graphics.
I have loved this game since i was a kid. really simple and fun game i get hooked on it for hours at a time
Chinese empire built pyramid is accurate, 10/10 game
it's a great game to learn about, wel... civilization  :)
goooood game, very chill, explains itself well
Testiculus Ceasar, thats all i have to say
classic, conquer the world0
I played for more that 11 hours total and still have no idea how to play properly.
best game ever best civ by far
Classic turn based game
I got to be God for 20 minutes.
My favorite civ of them all!
still the best civi game
Been playing this game since it came out soooo good
Fun game, takes a while to master.
best version of civ
This is the best game ever created
old and good game
Best game NA
great game
Cool Autism Game
Classic Game
Highly addictive!
great
old favorite
oh god i love war
I can quit anytime I want.
spearman > tank
very re-playable
Game still rocks!
Still great game
love it!!
Brilliant!
cool
Best Civ.
nuke your enemies
yes
yes
yeah
Simple to play, very addictive, it's a long game, from start to finish usually around 40 hours. Enjoy

Civilization is my favorite PC game by far! It's a great game if you enjoy a slow paced style game with great detail into every aspect of managing you civilization. I recommend ANY of the series to play with #3 being the top of the list.

Classic civ! This installment (while not without its flaws) provides probably the most straight-forward civ gameplay with a LOT of charm. There are a few systems that have been much more refined in more recent installments into the franchise, but I do keep coming back to this absolute classic.

Since I first played Civ VI I've bought every game before that (5, 4 and now 3). I'm currently hooked to the game. It is complex (find that the AI is more challenging) and makes me remember of the games I played in my early teenage years in the early 2000.

It is quite amazing that I happen to discover Civ this late at my age.

I super recommend this game.
Absorbing and graphics better than later versions which over complicate
Fun game. Sometimes I have more fun just discovering the world rather than fighting other civilizations!
Just a fun strat game. A blast from the past. Cute, quirky, etc. :)

Very good settler spam game
somehow laggy on my laptop LOL

negative.review: the screen reduced to a 1/4 size and I can not play the game
Changed my screen parameters. Crashed my computer, hard. Lovely piece of malware.
Doesn't work properly
ФВЫФЫФВФЫВЦВ
After returning all these ages, the random number generator (spearmen beat tanks, no, WARRIORS beating tanks), and endless bullshit AI ganging up on borders is not worth it.
The game was changed from the Original Release and Gold Editions. Not sure how or why but even the easier difficulties are almost like playing Deity! AVOID!

Great game, I do not like it when they hate me.
I do not recommend this game, it's not for everyone but Firaxis should take it as a compliment.

A niche, A cult classic.
the screen reduced to a 1/4 size and I can not play the game
Changed my screen parameters. Crashed my computer, hard. Lovely piece of malware.
A product of its time that belongs in the past
Doesn't work properly
No good.
will NOT run
